pageContext.claim: “I didn't criticize the Prime Minister. I have a lot of respect for the Prime Minister. And, unfortunately, there was a story that was done, which was generally fine, but it didn't put in what I said about the Prime Minister. And I said tremendous things. … It's called fake news.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeatedly criticized May during an interview with the Sun, accusing her of mismanaging the Brexit process, ignoring his advice and the will of British voters, and threatening that her Brexit plans could kill a potential trade deal with the U.S. Trump also said not very subtly that another British politician, Boris Johnson, would make a good prime minister.
